about_the_game:
Welcome to Exo Exploits

As an Operator of the Galactic Trade Federation (GTF), you are sent to distant planets to expand your corporate empire. Your mission is simple: build factories, exploit resources, and turn profits. But in a galaxy driven by greed,how far will you go to meet the Federation’s demands?

  • Build and Expand Your Industrial Empire

Design and manage a futuristic factory complex to maximize efficiency and profit. Balance resource extraction, production, and logistics as you grow your off-planet empire.

  • Create and Command Space Fleets

Craft specialized spaceships for trade, research, and defense. Assemble fleets to secure lucrative trade routes, fend off competitors, and unlock new opportunities across the galaxy.

  • Complete Contracts and Influence the Federation

Take on contracts from the GTF, ranging from resource gathering to fleet building. Every decision impacts your standing with the Federation’s ruthless officials. Success brings rewards; failure has consequences.

  • Master a Neon-Fused, Retro-Futuristic Aesthetic

Immerse yourself in the vibrant, synthwave-inspired visuals of Exo Exploits. From glowing factory floors to pulsating space vistas, the retro-futuristic atmosphere makes every moment unforgettable.
detailed_description:
Welcome to Exo Exploits

As an Operator of the Galactic Trade Federation (GTF), you are sent to distant planets to expand your corporate empire. Your mission is simple: build factories, exploit resources, and turn profits. But in a galaxy driven by greed,how far will you go to meet the Federation’s demands?

  • Build and Expand Your Industrial Empire

Design and manage a futuristic factory complex to maximize efficiency and profit. Balance resource extraction, production, and logistics as you grow your off-planet empire.

  • Create and Command Space Fleets

Craft specialized spaceships for trade, research, and defense. Assemble fleets to secure lucrative trade routes, fend off competitors, and unlock new opportunities across the galaxy.

  • Complete Contracts and Influence the Federation

Take on contracts from the GTF, ranging from resource gathering to fleet building. Every decision impacts your standing with the Federation’s ruthless officials. Success brings rewards; failure has consequences.

  • Master a Neon-Fused, Retro-Futuristic Aesthetic

Immerse yourself in the vibrant, synthwave-inspired visuals of Exo Exploits. From glowing factory floors to pulsating space vistas, the retro-futuristic atmosphere makes every moment unforgettable.
name: Exo Exploits

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 3.7GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 970 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 3.80GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Build, manage, and exploit your way to intergalactic dominance in this retro-futuristic factory sim. Extract resources, construct factories, build spaceships, and establish trade routes in a neon-drenched galaxy where profit is king.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
